about_the_game:
A statement of style and speed on the track. Two absolutely jaw-dropping designs, with killer performance. Of course, we are talking about Impavido 1™, a stunning exotic car that embodies the spirit of the best supercars and, as the name suggests, is not afraid of anything or anyone thanks to its truly unrivaled capabilities that will lead it to dominate your races. And Electro Silhouette™, a futuristic racing car powered by an electric engine that has nothing to envy to traditional engines in terms of performance. This jewel of technology may be eco-friendly, but it is certainly not rival-friendly. Winning will be even more electrifying! Supercharge your collection with the new vehicles of the Speed Kings Pack!

This DLC includes:
  • Impavido 1™
  • Electro Silhouette™

This DLC is not included in any Season Pass.
detailed_description:
A statement of style and speed on the track. Two absolutely jaw-dropping designs, with killer performance. Of course, we are talking about Impavido 1™, a stunning exotic car that embodies the spirit of the best supercars and, as the name suggests, is not afraid of anything or anyone thanks to its truly unrivaled capabilities that will lead it to dominate your races. And Electro Silhouette™, a futuristic racing car powered by an electric engine that has nothing to envy to traditional engines in terms of performance. This jewel of technology may be eco-friendly, but it is certainly not rival-friendly. Winning will be even more electrifying! Supercharge your collection with the new vehicles of the Speed Kings Pack!

This DLC includes:
  • Impavido 1™
  • Electro Silhouette™

This DLC is not included in any Season Pass.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent / AMD FX-4350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-9900k or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 Super / Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: A statement of style and speed on the track. Supercharge your collection with the vehicles of the Speed Kings Pack! The fearless and stunning Impavido 1™, and the technological Electro Silhouette™, to make your victories even more electrifying!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Indonesian*
*languages with full audio support
